keybinding-header.description: Hotkeys to switch focus relative to the current window

under-key.tooltip: Switch to the next window in the z-order that is overlapped by the current window. If the key combo is pressed again within 3 sec, the focus will change to the next window beneath the window that originally had the focus during the fist key combo press.

next-focus.tooltip: When using the Left, Right, Above or Below hotkeys, activate the window that is either, closest to the current window, highest in the z-order (most recently focused) or closest window with a visible corner. Activating the closest window might activate a window that is currently completely obscured by other windows, but activating the highest window in the z-order might skip over visible windows that are closer to the current window. The Closest window with a visible corner option is a compromise that is designed to be more like what most people would generally expect (I hope)

include-other-monitors.description: Allow switching to windows on other monitors
